ProductInfo.Features:
Package List: 1). 16 Channel H.264 DVR with 1TB Hard Drive installed ; 12). Day Night Waterproof Cameras ; 12). 60ft Video Power Combined Cables ; 2) Power Adapter Unit
DVR adopts the standard Main profile H.264 compression technology, supports CIF/D1 recording, Network transmission, and playback simultaneously

1/3'' Cmos Cameras provides 420 TV Lines good resolution image.
ProductInfo.Name: 16 Channel CCTV Surveillance H.264 Security Network DVR + 12 x Day Night Waterproof Cameras Video System (1000GB HDD Pre-installed.)
